title: 2015 Audi Q5 TDI Premium Plus at No Reserve
description: This 2015 Audi Q5 Premium Plus is powered by a turbodiesel 3.0-liter TDI V6 linked with an eight-speed automatic transaxle and a Quattro all-wheel-drive system, and it is finished in Moonlight Blue Metallic over Pistachio Beige leather. Equipment includes Audi Xenon Plus headlights, Audi Parking System parking sensors, a rear-view camera, 20" five-arm-design alloy wheels, power-adjustable heated front seats, Audi MMI infotainment, navigation, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, and cruise control. The valve cover gaskets and air filter were replaced in preparation for the sale. This 8R Q5 has 57k miles and is now offered by the selling dealer at no reserve in Illinois with a clean Carfax report and a Louisiana title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a No Reserve: 2015 Audi Q5 TDI Premium Plus at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #197,573.
text: This 2015 Audi Q5 Premium Plus is powered by a turbodiesel 3.0-liter TDI V6 linked with an eight-speed automatic transaxle and a Quattro all-wheel-drive system, and it is finished in Moonlight Blue Metallic over Pistachio Beige leather. Equipment includes Audi Xenon Plus headlights, Audi Parking System parking sensors, a rear-view camera, 20″ five-arm-design alloy wheels, power-adjustable heated front seats, Audi MMI infotainment, navigation, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, and cruise control. The valve cover gaskets and air filter were replaced in preparation for the sale. This 8R Q5 has 57k miles and is now offered by the selling dealer at no reserve in Illinois with a clean Carfax report and a Louisiana title. The vehicle is finished in Moonlight Blue Metallic (LX5R), and exterior features include Audi Xenon Plus headlights, fog lights, power-adjustable side mirrors, Audi Parking System parking sensors, roof rails, and a rear window wiper. The 20″ five-arm-design alloy wheels are mounted with Continental tires. Stopping power is provided by four-wheel ventilated discs. The cabin features power-adjustable heated front seats and a rear bench upholstered in Pistachio Beige leather. Interior appointments include a rear-view camera, Audi MMI infotainment, navigation, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, cruise control, and dual-zone automatic climate control. The leather-wrapped steering wheel frames a 160-mph speedometer, a tachometer, and gauges for coolant temperature and fuel level. The digital odometer indicates 57k miles. The turbodiesel 3.0-liter TDI V6 was factory rated at 240 horsepower and 428 lb-ft of torque, which is routed to all four wheels through an eight-speed automatic transaxle and a Quattro all-wheel-drive system. An oil change was performed and the air filter and valve cover gaskets were replaced in June 2025. The Carfax report shows no accidents or damage. The Louisiana title is listed as a duplicate. html:
This 2015 Audi Q5 Premium Plus is powered by a turbodiesel 3.0-liter TDI V6 linked with an eight-speed automatic transaxle and a Quattro all-wheel-drive system, and it is finished in Moonlight Blue Metallic over Pistachio Beige leather. Equipment includes Audi Xenon Plus headlights, Audi Parking System parking sensors, a rear-view camera, 20″ five-arm-design alloy wheels, power-adjustable heated front seats, Audi MMI infotainment, navigation, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, and cruise control. The valve cover gaskets and air filter were replaced in preparation for the sale. This 8R Q5 has 57k miles and is now offered by the selling dealer at no reserve in Illinois with a clean Carfax report and a Louisiana title.

The vehicle is finished in Moonlight Blue Metallic (LX5R), and exterior features include Audi Xenon Plus headlights, fog lights, power-adjustable side mirrors, Audi Parking System parking sensors, roof rails, and a rear window wiper.

The 20″ five-arm-design alloy wheels are mounted with Continental tires. Stopping power is provided by four-wheel ventilated discs.

The cabin features power-adjustable heated front seats and a rear bench upholstered in Pistachio Beige leather. Interior appointments include a rear-view camera, Audi MMI infotainment, navigation, a Bang & Olufsen sound system, cruise control, and dual-zone automatic climate control.

The leather-wrapped steering wheel frames a 160-mph speedometer, a tachometer, and gauges for coolant temperature and fuel level. The digital odometer indicates 57k miles.

The turbodiesel 3.0-liter TDI V6 was factory rated at 240 horsepower and 428 lb-ft of torque, which is routed to all four wheels through an eight-speed automatic transaxle and a Quattro all-wheel-drive system. An oil change was performed and the air filter and valve cover gaskets were replaced in June 2025.

The Carfax report shows no accidents or damage.

The Louisiana title is listed as a duplicate.
